actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1476.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11622 to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 to provide for the safe operation of pipelines transporting natural gas, petroleum, petroleum products, and certain other materials, to provide standards with respect to the siting, construction, and operation of liquefied natural gas and liquid petroleum gas facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11622 (Pipeline safety).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11622 to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 to provide for the safe operation of pipelines transporting natural gas, petroleum, petroleum products, and certain other materials, to provide standards with respect to the siting, construction, and operation of liquefied natural gas and liquid petroleum gas facilities, and for other purposes.
